CSS for lightbox images

Center an image horizontally and vertically:

.centerImage {
  position: fixed;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate3D(-50%, -50%, 0);
}

Size an image appropriately on both desktop and mobile: (I originally did width: 85vw which looked nice on desktop but poor on mobile)

.appropriateSize {
  max-height: 90vh;
  height: auto;
  max-width: 100vw;
  width: min(100vw, 1800px);
}

Gatsby stuff

The deploy script starts with gatsby clean, since gatsby has a bug where it won't prefix image paths properly if you run gatsby develop before deploying.

    "deploy": "gatsby clean && gatsby build --prefix-paths && gh-pages -d public -b master"
